title: Martin Scorsese directs
creator_credit: Steven Fischer, Joel Sucher and Pacific Street Film Projects
brief_description: This documentary visits the set, the editing rooms and the mixing studios during the production of “Goodfellas”. It also includes many clips from his body of work including “Mean Streets”, “Raging Bull”, “New York, New York” and “The Last Temptation of Christ”, as well as interviews with the director, his family, friends and colleagues from the film world such as Steven Spielberg, Robert De Niro, Harvey Keitel, Joe Pesci, and George Lucas.
